text: Colobothea appendiculata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1902. It is known from Bolivia and French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Colobothea appendiculata. title: Colobothea appendiculata
